thread.title: This Sloth Pic Is Sparking Some Amazing Photoshop Battles
thread.title_full: This Sloth Pic Is Sparking Some Amazing Photoshop Battles

author: Emily Burns
title: This Sloth Pic Is Sparking Some Amazing Photoshop Battles
text:
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter + 
With all of the political nonsense overwhelming our newsfeeds lately, we appreciate any and every lighthearted escape offered to us. 
So, when we came across one of Reddit’s plethora of hilarious photoshop battles involving an adorably aloof sloth, we couldn’t help but share it with you. Tbh, we could all use a good laugh. Here’s the original photo: 
He almost looks animated already and those arms are too hilarious. 1. Then came ballet dancer sloth 2. This figure skate r sloth 3. A time-teller sloth
